item.title: London Palladium blocking the pavement consistently Monday to Saturday 9.30 till 10.30, 23rd June
item.description:
Dangerous blocking pavement for entertainment and marketing purposes at the stage door Unacceptable behaviour of security stopping there free movement and having to go into the road on a busy road to pass Using barriers to close off pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7-8, Argyll Street, London

item.title: A large portion of the tree has been damaged with the high winds and is laying across the pavement, 23rd June
item.description:
Damaged tree due to high winds over the weekend. Large part of tree is hanging across pavements
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mapledene Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unleashed Dog Causing Safety Concerns, 23rd June
item.description:
A large dog, possibly a PPP breed, is often seen off-leash in the Estate, sometimes without an owner nearby. This poses a safety risk to families, children, and other pets in the Estate. Please look into this matter.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Valette Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fatal accident, 23rd June
item.description:
A fatal accident occured with the junction of Glen Hurst Rd just off Hurst Rd on Sat late evening. The police have removed the tape. A chap, I believe from the council today swept the area but there are remnants if the woman's bag strewn across the street, gutter and bank. Blood is clearly visible on the brick walls and pavements. Please can you resolve respectfully. My child and several others were visibly upset to witness the aftermath that has not been cleared properly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 507, Hurst Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Rubbish

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Avenue, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Skips left for roofing work being used by the residents for general rubbish, 23rd June
item.description:
Since general rubbish has been put in skip other people have dug deep to find 'gold' in the skip. This has resulted in daberry being stroune on the pavement and Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Cressingham Road, Ladywell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Urgent Action Required – Unacceptable Litter and Fly-tipping by Plumstead Station, 23rd June
item.description:
There is a large amount of litter and fly-tipped waste right at the Plumstead station gates, as shown in the attached photo. The area appears not to have been cleaned for some time. This is unacceptable given it’s directly in view of passengers daily and reflects poorly on the gentrifying area. Action requested: Immediate cleaning of the site Installation of clear signage to prevent further fly-tipping This requires urgent attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 re Rosendale Playing Fields north, 23rd June
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 re Rosendale Playing Fields north entrance ie opposite side of the road to house number 211. Enamel type sign attached to the fence tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/place/240+Rosendale+Rd,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8LP/@51.4441856,-0.09783,3a,75y,75.49h,66.45t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1snFXNA6mmWYT8pebLZ3g7tA!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D23.552185322725705%26panoid%3DnFXNA6mmWYT8pebLZ3g7tA%26yaw%3D75.48985810828162!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x4876040910a81c3d:0x2ae0948949a90e0c!8m2!3d51.4447001!4d-0.097677!16s%2Fg%2F11c4rq4qzr?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYxNy4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosendale Road, Tulse Hill, London

item.title: Dumped fridge freezer now laying half in the road, 23rd June
item.description:
Hi, someone has dumped a fridge freezer in Melling Street. It is now on the corner of swingate lane and Melling street partly blocking the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melling Street, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 additional bins in the park, 23rd June
item.description:
2 additional bins required. One OUTSIDE of the playground by the container (around that area) and on a left hand side of the minster road. Additional bins are required due to parks popularity and overflowing bins during the summer. Also the playground bin is not friendly for other users without kids.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hilldrop Road, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 8LP - black box tagged, 23rd June
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 8LP outside house number 240 small ie no higher than your knee black painted box graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/place/240+Rosendale+Rd,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8LP/@51.4446886,-0.0979613,3a,50.7y,104.35h,64.67t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sKYC73L2r3A6DpKIxCIYH6w!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D25.330330618173107%26panoid%3DKYC73L2r3A6DpKIxCIYH6w%26yaw%3D104.34678645910657!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x4876040910a81c3d:0x2ae0948949a90e0c!8m2!3d51.4447001!4d-0.097677!16s%2Fg%2F11c4rq4qzr?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYxNy4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

item.title: More litter bins needed at Kings Meadow, 23rd June
item.description:
One is in the playground and there’s only another one on the far side of the park. It’s causing unnecessary litter in the park. The result is local residents have had to set up litter picking days. If we had more bins, this would not only reduce litter but also the effort by residents to keep the park tidy.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hilldrop Road, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of rubbish has been dumped near my house and is a fire hazard, 23rd June
item.description:
This rubbish has been flytipped here since last Thursday. I previously reported it and got a bizarre response that it wasn’t the council’s responsibility. I have forwarded this to my local MP as it clearly is the council’s responsibility

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pasley Close, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 8LP outside house number 240, 23rd June
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 8LP outside house number 240 “Rosendale Road” street name board (next to Dalkeith Rd junction) – plastic vinyl type with a four letter ‘word’ on it. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/place/240+Rosendale+Rd,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8LP/@51.4447936,-0.0979378,3a,60y,113.77h,66.39t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1s3xZy95mRwkwEENcet8d-MQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D23.60507099926342%26panoid%3D3xZy95mRwkwEENcet8d-MQ%26yaw%3D113.77386720848395!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x4876040910a81c3d:0x2ae0948949a90e0c!8m2!3d51.4447001!4d-0.097677!16s%2Fg%2F11c4rq4qzr?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYxNy4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
